deactivation_alert.description: Describes either the impact of deactivating the inventory level, or why the inventory level can't be deactivated.

available.description: The quantity of items available for sale in the inventory.

quantities.description: The quantities of items available for sale in the inventory.

created_at.description: The date and time when the inventory level was created.

location_id.description: The unique identifier for the location related to the inventory level.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the inventory level was last updated.

inventory_history_url.description: The URL that points to the inventory history for the item.

inventory_item_id.description: The unique identifier for the associated inventory item.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the inventory belongs.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the inventory levels in GraphQL format.

can_deactivate.description: Whether the inventory items associated with the inventory level can be deactivated.

locations_count.description: The number of locations where this inventory item is stocked.

id.description: The unique identifier for the inventory level.
